name: @deskpro-apps/shortcut
title: Shortcut
description: Link tickets to Shortcut stories so agents can track a story's progress from a ticket

default_comment_on_ticket_reply.title: Ticket reply as comment
default_comment_on_ticket_reply.description: Enable option to add Deskpro replies as story comments when a Shortcut story is linked to a Deskpro ticket

default_comment_on_ticket_note.title: Ticket note as comment
default_comment_on_ticket_note.description: Enable option to add Deskpro notes as story comments when a Shortcut story is linked to a Deskpro ticket

dont_add_deskpro_label.title: Do not add "Deskpro" label when creating or linking Shortcut stories
dont_add_deskpro_label.description: Disable automatically adding a label to indicate in Shortcut that the story is currently linked to a Deskpro ticket
